mapper.input:
Get the file id{{3.id}} witht he name {{3.filename}}.

Retrieve the following elements: Date, Supplier, Name, Price, and currency used.

Example of the expectecd json output format:
[
      {  
          "Date": "2025-02-18",
          "Supplier": "make.com",
          "Price": 9.99,
          "Currency": "€"
      }
]
